channel.title: blog on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Damien Saunders

item.title: Hello World Redux
item.description: For the past month (2 or 3 months??) I’ve been more than quiet – I’ve really not been around. So this is just me saying ‘Hello World’ again. Actually it’s been a crazy time – I’ve spent 6 weeks working in Maastricht in the Netherlands (or Holland if you don’t know better) which was an eye opener of an IT programme. And then … I moved house. Finally, I changed to working on the deployment of another CRM system for MVNO’s.

item.title: Saturday Humour – Size of blogging [infographic]
item.description: Saturday’s usual weekly comic has been moved aside this week for something more important. So its a week to Xmas … and all through the house not a creature was stirring – except for creatives and marketing types publishing their great present gifts for the world to enjoy. What’s your opinion? do you think this Tree of Blogs sums things up quite nicely? and looking ahead – will the roots generate enough food and support for the future?
